subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Pete Sampras expected his record of the most men’s major singles titles to last. But by 2006, Sampras knew Roger Federer was capable of breaking it.
snippet: Pete Sampras expected his record of the most men’s major singles titles to last. But by 2006, Sampras knew Roger Federer was capable of breaking it.
